860503192349532160.text: It will provide critical communication links in times of disasters such as earthquakes, cyclones, floods, and tsunamis.

860503137416695808.text: The satellite will facilitate DTH television, VSAT links, tele-education, telemedicine and disaster management support.

860503088238428161.text: Each country will get access to at least one transponder through which they could beam their own programming.

860503033704103936.text: The South Asia Satellite has 12 Ku band transponders which India's neighbours can utilise to increase communications.

860502724227379201.text: The footprint of the Satellite extends all over South Asia.

860502594589872128.text: The gift of a communications satellite for use by neighbours at no cost has perhaps no precedent worldwide.

860502534183464960.text: Here are some unique highlights of the South Asia Satellite that was successfully launched today.

857178442013433856.text: This with proportionate pricing for routes of different stage lengths and flight duration.

857178361990225920.text: Airfare for a 1 hour journey of appx. 500 km on a fixed wing aircraft or for 30 minute journey on a helicopter would be capped at Rs. 2,500.

857177509720240129.text: The UDAN Scheme is a key component of the National Civil Aviation Policy (NCAP) which was released on 15th June, 2016.

857177408679460865.text: UDAN Scheme is a first-of-its-kind scheme globally to stimulate regional connectivity through a market-based mechanism.

828872851990073344.text: आज बदलाव अचानक नहीं आए हैं, योजनाबद्ध तरीके से लाए जा रहे हैं और इस दिशा में भागीरथ प्रयास किये जा रहे हैं: PM @narendramodi

828870578064855040.text: क्या कारण रहा जो मनरेगा जैसे पोपुलर कार्यक्रम के नियमों में 1035 बार परिवर्तन करना पड़ा? देश जानना चाहता है: PM @narendramodi

828869594378932226.text: नोटबंदी के दौरान एक तरफ देश को लूटने वाले लोग थे और दूसरी तरफ ईमानदारी का प्रयास किया जा रहा था: PM @narendramodi

828867630316474368.text: Like Swachh Bharat, the decision on demonetisation is a movement to clean India (from corruption and black money): PM @narendramodi

828866887400329218.text: When can you have an operation? When the body is healthy. The economy was doing well and thus our decision was taken at the right time: PM

828866083549384708.text: We do not see everything from the prism of elections. The interests of the nation are supreme for us: PM @narendramodi

828865693793660928.text: आप कितने भी बड़े क्यों न हो, आपको गरीबों के हक का लौटना पड़ेगा। मैं गरीबों के लिए लड़ता रहा हूँ और आगे भी लड़ता रहूँगा: PM @narendramodi

828865600944345088.text: My fight is for the poor and giving the poor their due. This fight will continue: PM @narendramodi

828865341866381312.text: It does not matter how big you are, you will have to give back what belongs to the poor. My fight is for the poor: PM @narendramodi

828864683624927233.text: पहले होता था – कितना गया, अब होता है – मोदी जी कितना लाये...this is how discourse has changed after we have assumed office: PM @narendramodi

828864015375880197.text: From Day 1, we have been clear- we are ready for a discussion on demonetisation but some were more keen on TV bytes & not debates: PM

828863485215797248.text: When Rail budget was first presented, the transport sector was different. Now things are different & a more comprehensive look is needed: PM

828862267546427392.text: I was surprised that there were some who made cleanliness also a political issue. Why can't we work together on ushering a Swachh Bharat: PM

828861491793125376.text: I had said it from the Red Fort-  every Prime Minister has contributed to the nation: PM @narendramodi in the Lok Sabha

828861208421806080.text: Let us understand & appreciate the inherent strength of our people & take India to newer heights. Faith in Jan Shakti will give results: PM

828860949616488448.text: Somewhere on the way, 'Jan Shakti' was forgotten. We do not accept this: PM @narendramodi in the Lok Sabha

828860451849175041.text: There are many people like me, who could not die for the nation during the freedom struggle but we are living for India & serving India: PM

828859638187646977.text: It is due to this 'Jan Shakti' that the person born to a poor family can become the Prime Minister of India: PM @narendramodi

828859516452167682.text: We remember how democracy was under threat from 1975 to 1977, when opposition leaders were jailed, newspaper freedom curtailed: PM

828859149333073921.text: There is something very special about 'Jan Shakti' : PM @narendramodi

828858975655309312.text: How can someone see 'SEVA' or any positive virtue in the word 'SCAM' : PM @narendramodi in the Lok Sabha

828857871941005313.text: Various members of the House added vigour into the debate & shared insightful points. I thank the MPs for their participation: PM
